title: #169: The Teacher's Pet: Analyzing Helena's Police Statement Part 2
description:
The RCP team (Laura Richards, Lisa Zambetti and Jim Clemente) continue their discussion and analysis of Helena Simm's police statement which she made on August 21 1982, seven days after the "Antecedent Report" written by Chris Dawson.


#HerNameWasLynDawson

#CoerciveControl

#TheTeachersPet


If you have any information about Lyn's disappearance and/or the historical sexual abuse allegations, please contact Crimestoppers on 1800 333 000



For more information about coercive control

https://www.laurarichards.co.uk/deep-diving-coercive-control/


Advice if you are being abused

https://www.laurarichards.co.uk/advice-if-you-are-experiencing-abuse/
